TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement
Public MustInherit Class ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement Inherits SecurityTokenRequirement

summary.span: An abstract class that when implemented specifies security property requirements of the token being requested or authenticated that are specific to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

span.span: An abstract class that when implemented specifies security property requirements of the token being requested or authenticated that are specific to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

summary.span: The security token manager constructs security token providers and security token authenticators that are used by the WCF security processor based on the token requirement.

span.span: The security token manager constructs security token providers and security token authenticators that are used by the WCF security processor based on the token requirement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖是以密碼編譯方式簽署的資料單位，會根據認證傳送驗證和授權資訊。A security token is a cryptographically signed data unit that transfers authentication and authorization information, based on a credential. 安全性權杖管理員會使用此衍生類別來指定安全性權杖的必要項目，例如金鑰大小、金鑰類型以及金鑰的使用方式。The derived class is used by a security token manager to specify what is required of a security token, such as the key size, key type, and how the key can be used. 如果安全性權杖被識別成符合指定準則，此時就可以建立 和 ，以便分別為傳出 SOAP 訊息提供安全性權杖，以及為傳入 SOAP 訊息驗證安全性權杖。When a security token can be identified that matches the specified criteria, a and can be created to provide security tokens for outgoing SOAP messages and to authenticate security tokens for incoming SOAP messages, respectively. 例如，傳出 SOAP 訊息的預設安全性權杖管理員具有會接受 `CreateSecurityTokenProvider` 參數的 方法，而您可以呼叫這個方法，取得符合該安全性權杖需求的安全性權杖提供者。For example, the default security token manager for outgoing SOAP messages has the `CreateSecurityTokenProvider` method that takes a parameter that can be called to obtain a security token provider that matches the security token provider. 這個類別的基底類別為 ，其中包含會將屬性名稱對應至其值的字典 。This class's base class, , contains a dictionary, , which maps property names to their values. 這個類別包含大量的屬性，其名稱結尾會是 "Property" 一字。This class has numerous properties whose name ends in the word "Property". 這些屬性會傳回字串，這些字串就是用於從字典 `get` 或 `set` 對應值的索引鍵。These properties return a string, which is the key used to `get` or `set` the corresponding value from the dictionary. 例如， 是 屬性值的索引鍵。For example, is the key for the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已設為 `false`。The is set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AuditLogLocationProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ AuditLogLocationProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the token requirement property name whose value is the location of the audit log to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

span.span: Gets the token requirement property name whose value is the location of the audit log to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 在權杖需求之 Properties 字典中 AuditLogLocation 的索引鍵。

span.span: The key for the AuditLogLocation in the token requirement's Properties dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性名稱之對應值的型別為 ，其為含有下列成員的列舉型別 (Enumeration)：The value that corresponds to this property name is of type , which is an enumeration with the following members: - ：在作業系統事件記錄檔中的應用程式記錄檔。: The Application log in the operating system Event Log. - ：由作業系統決定的預設位置。: The default location, which is determined by the operating system. - ：在事件記錄檔中的安全性記錄檔。: The Security log in the Event Log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果產生權杖需求的通道是雙工通道，這個屬性會包含此雙工通道接聽傳入訊息的端點位址。In case the channel that produces the token requirement is a duplex channel, this property contains the endpoint address on which the duplex channel is listening for incoming messages.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property MessageAuthenticationAuditLevelProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ MessageAuthenticationAuditLevelProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the audit level to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the audit level to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值就是在記錄驗證結果時所使用的稽核層級。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the audit level to use when recording the results of the authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個索引鍵之對應值的型別為 ，其為含有下列成員的列舉型別 (Enumeration)：The value that corresponds to this key is of type , which is an enumeration with the following members: - ：只會記錄失敗的安全性相關事件。: Only failed security-related events are recorded. - ：不會記錄任何事件。: No events are recorded. - ：只會記錄成功的安全性相關事件。: Only successful security-related events are recorded. - ：失敗和成功的安全性相關事件都會加以記錄。: Both failed and successful security-related events are recorded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property MessageDirectionProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ MessageDirectionProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the member of the enumeration to use and that indicates whether the token provider is needed for messages sent from client to server or server to client.

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the member of the enumeration to use and that indicates whether the token provider is needed for messages sent from client to server or server to client.

value.span: 取得權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值為要使用之 列舉的成員。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the member of the enumeration to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個索引鍵之對應值的型別為 。The value that corresponds to this key is of type . 認證實作會使用這個屬性，提供在處理要求和回應時所用的不同權杖。This property can be used by credential implementations to provide different tokens for processing the request and the response. 例如在認證實作中，端點會指定其用來簽署傳出訊息的不同憑證，並且指定由另一方用來加密傳送至該端點的不同憑證。An example is a credential implementation where the endpoint can specify a different certificate that it signs outgoing messages with and a different certificate to be used by other parties to encrypt messages for it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ MessageSecurityVersion { System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ value); };

value.span: 訊息安全性版本。

span.span: The message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含許多可用來指定訊息之各種元件版本號碼的屬性。The contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different components of a message.

span.span: Specifies the current namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的 物件含有許多可用來指定在特定情況下使用之安全性演算法的屬性。The object that is returned contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms to use in specific conditions. 它還會描述服務的各種安全性功能。It also describes various security capabilities of the service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SupportingTokenAttachmentModeProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SupportingTokenAttachmentModeProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the associated enumeration member if the request is for a supporting token.

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the associated enumeration member if the request is for a supporting token.

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值為相關聯 列舉的成員。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the associated enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是有關支援權杖的要求，`SupportingTokenAttachmentMode` 屬性便是 列舉的成員。The `SupportingTokenAttachmentMode` property is a member of the enumeration member if the request is for a supporting token. 支援權杖會為繫結提供主體權杖內所含宣告以外的其他宣告。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the principal tokens for the binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether the secure conversation token is for a security session (in which case its lifetime is tied to the lifetime of the user’s channel) or for a datagram security channel.

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether the secure conversation token is for a security session (in which case its lifetime is tied to the lifetime of the user’s channel) or for a datagram security channel.

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值會指出安全對話權杖是否應為可取消的。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether the secure conversation token should be cancelable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是有關安全對話權杖的權杖，`SupportSecurityContextCancellation` 會包含值，而這個值會指出安全對話權杖是用於安全性工作階段 (在這種情況下，存留期與使用者之通道的存留期緊密相關) 或資料包安全性通道。When the requirement is for a secure conversation token, `SupportSecurityContextCancellation` contains a value that indicates whether the secure conversation token is for a security session (in which case its lifetime is tied to the lifetime of the user’s channel) or for a datagram security channel.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SuppressAuditFailureProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SuppressAuditFailureProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether to ignore errors that occur when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether to ignore errors that occur when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值會指出是否要忽略在記錄驗證結果時所發生的錯誤。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether to ignore errors that occur when recording the results of the authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetAddressProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ TargetAddressProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the endpoint address that the channel is talking to (client only).

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the endpoint address that the channel is talking to (client only).

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值為通道正與其溝通的 。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the that the channel is talking to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TransportScheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the transport scheme.

span.span: Gets or sets the transport scheme.

value.span: 傳輸配置。

span.span: The transport scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果為傳輸安全性，這個屬性便會包含產生權杖需求之 `TransportBindingElement` 的傳輸配置。In case of transport security, this property contains the transport scheme of the `TransportBindingElement` that produces the token requirement.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TransportSchemeProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ TransportSchemeProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: If the request is made for a token provider/authenticator to be used with transport security, this string is the key for the token requirement property whose value is the transport scheme.

span.span: If the request is made for a token provider/authenticator to be used with transport security, this string is the key for the token requirement property whose value is the transport scheme.

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值就是該傳輸配置。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the transport scheme.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ViaProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ ViaProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the Via URI that the channel is connecting to (client only).

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the Via URI that the channel is connecting to (client only).

value.span: 權杖需求屬性的索引鍵，其值為通道正在連接的 Via URI。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the Via URI that the channel is connecting to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含中繼目的地的 URI。The property contains the URI of an intermediate destination.
